DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate safety feasibility early intensive physical therapy patient diagnose subarachnoid hemorrhage . Intervention begin neurological ICU continue 30 day hospital discharge .
DOC.brief_title: Early Intensive Physical Therapy Subarachnoid Hemorrhage
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose CT scan MRI subarachnoid hemorrhage admit neurological ICU > 48 hour . Significant language barrier would limit ability participate physical therapy program Severe baseline physical cognitive impairment would impair ability participate protocol Patients whose vital sign outside accept start stop criterion outline : 1. intracranial pressure ≤ 15 mm Hg 2 . Cerebral perfusion pressure > 50 < 70 mm Hg 3 . Mean arterial pressure ≥ 80 ≤ 110 4 . Heart rate ≥40 < 140 bpm 5 . Pulse oximetry > 88 %
